title: I Just Wanted Groceries
description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 38. Avoid strangers and finish shopping!

title: Hexshaper
description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 35. Absorb enemy projectiles and close the portals!

title: Crypt of the Minotaur
description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 33. Play as the Minotaur to defend your treasure!

title: Sweep Stacks
description: This game was created for Ludum Dare 31. Sweep across the screen to clear blocks!

title: Excalibird
description: This is a sample clone of the popular mobile game flappy bird.

title: Kraken Unchained
description: Sample game made for Ludum Dare 29. Play as a Kraken and destroy ships!
